name: LegalShield AI
idea: An AI-powered legal services platform that provides small businesses with affordable, instant access to legal document creation, contract review, and on-demand attorney consultations. LegalShield AI democratizes legal protection, making it accessible to every entrepreneur.

business.target_audience: Small business owners and entrepreneurs who need legal protection but can't afford traditional law firm retainers or full-time legal counsel
pain_points: Legal fees eating into tight business budgets
Uncertainty about contract terms and legal risks
Slow turnaround times from traditional law firms
No access to legal expertise for quick questions
business.value_proposition: Get enterprise-level legal protection at small business prices with AI-powered efficiency
unique_selling_points: AI contract review in under 5 minutes

features.title: Instant Contract Review
features.description: Upload any contract and get a detailed risk analysis, plain-English summary, and negotiation suggestions in minutes.

features.title: Document Library
features.description: Access 500+ attorney-drafted templates for NDAs, employment agreements, service contracts, and more.

features.title: Attorney Network
features.description: When you need human expertise, connect with vetted attorneys for affordable consultations starting at $49.
